description:
Kiyotaka finds himself bound together with his best friend Kousuke and surrounded by Elizabeth, Tomoe, Shiki, Ricca, and Charles in the student council`s office. He still doesn`t quite understand how he got there, but it seems they think he knows what Suginami and the Unofficial Newspaper Club are plotting.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Festival of Beautiful Women and a Place with a Beautiful Sunset
Bishoujo Matsuri to Yuuhi ga Kirei na Tokoro
美少女祭りと夕日が綺麗な場所
